project.description: LaunchPad is the all-in-one platform that helps startups go from idea to launch in record time. Stop juggling tools and start shipping products that matter.
project.target_audience: Early-stage startup founders and indie hackers
project.value_proposition: Launch your MVP 10x faster with AI-powered development workflows

hero.headline: Stop Planning. Start Shipping.
hero.subheadline: LaunchPad turns your ideas into live products. No more endless planning cycles. Just build, test, and ship.

features.title: Instant Setup
features.description: From zero to deployed in under 5 minutes. No configuration headaches.

features.title: AI Code Gen
features.description: Describe what you want. Watch it build. Ship it live.

features.title: Built-in Analytics
features.description: Know what works. Kill what doesn't. Iterate fast.

features.title: Team Sync
features.description: Real-time collaboration. No merge conflicts. Ever.

testimonial.quote: We launched our MVP in 3 days instead of 3 months. LaunchPad is insane.
testimonial.author: Alex Rivera

content.footer_cta: Your idea deserves to exist. Build it now.

headlines: Ideas Die in Planning. Ship Yours Today.
The Fastest Path From Idea to IPO

faq_items.question: How fast can I actually launch?
faq_items.answer: Most founders ship their first version within 48 hours. Our AI handles the boring stuff so you can focus on what matters.

faq_items.question: Do I need to know how to code?
faq_items.answer: Nope. If you can describe what you want in plain English, LaunchPad can build it. Technical founders love us too though.

faq_items.question: What about scaling?
faq_items.answer: LaunchPad grows with you. Start free, scale to millions of users. Infrastructure is handled automatically.
